author: yperbasis
content: I think it's settled that, starting from Shanghai, forks will be based on time rather than block number. To support the new network in Erigon we need it to be based on a fixed timestamp, similar to how `ArrowGlacierToMergeAtDiffC0000` has a fixed TTD.
